availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William F. Maddux (Kenton County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Maddux. Father of George Maddux and Alexander Maddux. Steamboat engineer in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 643
Find A Grave, "William F. Maddux (November 26, 1826-February 13, 1898)," Memorial #90232510, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90232510 (accessed February 25, 2019).
